newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - IBM Merrill Focus One.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - IBM Merrill Focus One.

text.p: -- Merrill Lynch said it named International Business Machines Corp its Focus One stock of the week.
-- Merrill analyst Daniel Mandresh on September 13 upgraded his rating on IBM to near-term buy from accumulate and maintained his long-term buy.
-- Mandresh was not available Wednesday for further details.
-- The stock rose 3/4 to 124-1/4 in U.S. pre-open activity Wednesday.
